name: imagEXIF
author: Iacami

sections.description: BETA – Populates image description with EXIF data (currently json formated) Adds EXIF data (if avaiable) to image description field json serialized Part of this plugin copied from https://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/display-exif/
sections.installation:
1. NEEDS EXIF Module running on PHP
  2. Upload plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. That’s all from now. In the future will have menus, options, formats, etc.
sections.faq:
WTF might I do with it?

Use the data on the gallery loop to show this data the way you prefer.
sections.changelog:
0.1

  • Basic commit – I don’t recomment it’s use on prodution, still have to work on the correct hook and more.
  • TODOs on the main plugin file.
